alert.note: Alert for Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 04 at 1:53PM CST until January 06 at 12:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM WEDNESDAY TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 29 below zero. * WHERE...Perkins County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 8 AM Wednesday to 5 AM MST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 PM Wednesday to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
